name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in backend development for scalable SaaS solutions, leveraging **Elixir** for robust server-side applications. My technical expertise encompasses **cloud computing** across Azure and AWS, and I have hands-on experience in **DevOps** practices, particularly with **CI/CD** automation for efficient software delivery. I specialize in developing and integrating **APIs** that support distributed systems and enhance system communication.
Additionally, I have a solid background in AI and chatbot implementation, utilizing modern technologies to build intelligent systems that enhance user interaction. My strengths lie in fostering collaboration within teams and driving project success through clear communication. I have a proven track record in enterprise-level projects that emphasize performance, compliance, and innovative solutions.
